persName.note: India.Arie is an African American Singer who promotes Black beauty and natural hair with her music.
Bob Marley is a Jamaican singer who is known for wearing dreadlocks, a type of natural hair style.
Oprah Winfrey is a black feminist activist, talk show host, producer, and is best known wearing her hair in straight styles.
